title: Escalation Between Israel and Hezbollah Hangs Over Gaza Cease-Fire Talks
content: The militant group’s leader says “the only way” to stop the hostilities across the Lebanon-Israel border is to negotiate an end to the fighting in Gaza.

title: ‘We Want Our Real Lives Back’: For Gazans, Egypt Is Safe, but It’s Not Home
content: Cairo now houses tens of thousands of Palestinians who fled the war in Gaza, with few job prospects, dwindling savings and no way to put their children in the local public schools.

title: What NATO’s Warning to China Means
content: NATO’s rare rebuke of China could lead to actions pressuring the country to curb exports to Russia. Beijing denounced it as “prejudice, smears and provocation.”

title: Kenya’s President Fires His Cabinet After Nationwide Protests
